Uses of Class
HelperClasses.BettingStrategy

  • Packages that use BettingStrategy 
    Package Description
    HelperClasses
    Contains classes that will be used by the messages to exchange information between entities.
    Interfaces
    Interfaces used to communicate with other entities with Java RMI.
    MainPackage
    Main package that contains the classes that launches the broker thread and communicates with the other shared regions by RMI.

    • Uses of BettingStrategy in HelperClasses

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BettingStrategy BettingStrategy.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static BettingStrategy[] BettingStrategy.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in HelperClasses with parameters of type BettingStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Bet BettingStrategy.applyStrategy(int spectatorID, java.util.ArrayList<SerializableHorse> horses, BettingStrategy bettingStrategy, int money)
      Apply betting strategy of a spectator to return a new bet, based on the horses currently on the race and on his current money.

    • Uses of BettingStrategy in Interfaces

      Methods in Interfaces with parameters of type BettingStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int BettingCenterInterface.placeABet(int id, java.util.ArrayList<SerializableHorse> horses, BettingStrategy strategy, int money)
      Spectator places a bet.
